meta.title: Exorcism of Curses and Black Magic

nodes.title: Exorcism of Curses and Black Magic
Related Terms
nodes.body: byad bzlog pa, byad grol/’grol, byad phur rbod gtong gi gnyen po

nodes.title: Example Texts
nodes.body:
• Seng gdong gyi sgo nas byad ‘grol byed tshul 
  • Bsam gtan bum chog byad grol 
  • Thugs sgrub bar chad kun sel las rdo rje gtsug tor byad grol srung ba bcas khyer bder phyungs ba gdengs cho ga ral gri
